snippet.title: Gloomy Juncture | Gameplay Trailer [WIP]
snippet.description:
Unravel your fate and cross the edge in this peculiar tale of obsession 👁️⃤🕵️‍♂️

You're not special; you're not a hero.

You'll step into the shoes of a mundane janitor asked to complete a final task before clocking out, and it will turn into a pulp mystery as your fate collides with the aftermath of a critical gunshot.

🔗 Follow and Wishlist: https://steam.gloomyjuncture.com/
🔗 https://gloomyjuncture.com/

Follow on Twitter/X to be up-to-date
🔗 https://twitter.com/SubtalesStudio

Other Socials
🔗 https://www.instagram.com/filipe_subtales.studio/
🔗 https://www.reddit.com/user/SubOathshot
🔗 https://www.tiktok.com/@subtales.studio

00:00 Preamble
00:14 Intro: Psychological Thriller in the '90s
00:22 With Graphics From Scanned Paper Drawings
00:47 Adventure With Hardcore Puzzles and Hidden Mysteries
01:11 Explore Environmental Puzzles in Weird Scenarios
01:58 Meet Peculiar People with Odd Requests
02:33 Listen to Your Inner Monologue for Tips & Context
03:03 Coda
03:19 Wishlist on Steam
03:23 Post-credits

---
